aboutPage.title: About Reform Tracker
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering Citizens Through Transparency and Accountability
aboutPage.heroDescription: We are dedicated to tracking, documenting, and analyzing reform initiatives across Bangladesh. Our mission is to bring transparency to government reforms and empower citizens with accessible, verified information.
aboutPage.missionDescription: To create a comprehensive, transparent platform that tracks government reform initiatives, commission reports, and political accountability. We believe that informed citizens are the foundation of a strong democracy.
aboutPage.visionDescription: A Bangladesh where every citizen has access to clear, accurate information about government reforms and can hold their representatives accountable for promised changes.
aboutPage.whatWeDoDescription: Reform Tracker serves as Bangladesh's premier platform for monitoring and analyzing government reform initiatives.
aboutPage.feature1Description: Comprehensive documentation of all reform commission reports, proposals, and recommendations with detailed analysis.
aboutPage.feature2Description: Track political party stances on reform proposals and monitor their commitments versus actual implementation.
aboutPage.feature3Description: Stay informed with the latest news, updates, and developments in Bangladesh's reform landscape.
aboutPage.feature4Description: Interactive dashboards and visualizations that make complex reform data accessible and understandable.
aboutPage.value1Description: We believe in open access to information and clear communication about all reform initiatives.
aboutPage.value2Description: Every piece of information is verified and sourced from official documents and reliable sources.
aboutPage.value3Description: We maintain political neutrality and present facts without bias or partisan influence.
aboutPage.value4Description: Information should be available to everyone, in multiple languages, and easy to understand.
aboutPage.teamDescription: Reform Tracker is built and maintained by a dedicated team of developers, researchers, and civic-minded individuals committed to transparency and good governance.
aboutPage.ctaDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest reform developments and help us build a more transparent Bangladesh.
aboutPage.contactDescription: Have questions, suggestions, or want to contribute? We'd love to hear from you.
